item.title: Long form writing in Logseq
item.description: An area that has traditionally been described as one of Logseq’s weak points is long form writing, with the right setup however, you can get very good experience. Hey guys, this is Aryan and in this video, I will be walking you through my long form writing setup and help you optimize the physical process of writing. While writing long form text, such as while scripting videos, I love the experience of using both IA Writer and Ulysses.
